poem:
**Visual Shocks**

From aperture to protest:
Kennard packs the cosmos 
into a grimace— 
seedlings of dissent 
tilted on their axes,
snapshots of the world's 
knife-edge, stark shadows 
punch through,
universal clippings— 
each a jagged joke,
the press of his hands 
a seismograph, 
each collage, 
a seismic wave.
